title: mecha event loot not working?
body: bought the 7500 RP bundle and i can't access any of the chests or the mecha shop

replies.body:
It appears that all the Mecha Kingdoms loot items are at present un-activatable.

I would imagine Riot is already aware, however, given the service status hasn't been updated to reflect it yet you could if you wish, add your voice to the post on the Report a Bug board: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/9KfABZRj-cant-open-mecha-kingdoms-orbs-or-token-shop
